doc.field: - Perception Technology Corp said it expects to take a charge of about 686,000 dlrs or 19 cts per share against earnings for the second quarter ended March 31 due to the bankruptcy proceeding of customer T.C. of New York Inc. Perception said it has outstanding lease receivables from T.C. of about 2,480,000 dlrs. It said the exact amnount of the charge will depend on the extent of recovery of the leased equipment involved and on arrangements that might be made with the bankruptcy court on the equipment.
